title: Box - Users and Access Management Insights
description: This dashboard tracks user activity, login trends, access changes, and management events, etc., to support secure and efficient access governance.

definition.content:
**[Box](https://www.box.com)** is a cloud-based file storage and collaboration platform that allows users to securely share, manage, and access files from anywhere.

This dashboard provides insights into user activity and access management in Box, covering login trends, user interactions, failed access attempts, group and folder management events, etc. It helps monitor user behavior, track administrative actions, and enhance access control visibility.

For more information, see the [Box Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/box/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
